p: Detoxifying enzymes, including esterases and glutathione S-transferases, are involved in reducing the impacts of exogenous compounds [ 51]. In the current study, the activity of detoxifying enzymes, including esterases and glutathione S-transferases, was reduced by essential oil of A. annua flowers. Certainly, the reduced activity of these enzymes is related to their production halt somewhere in the process of production [ 15].
